rows.label: qst501804_msg0001
rows.name: Ah, you must be Shiki.

rows.label: qst501804_msg0002
rows.name:
That's right. Are you here to
deliver the Tome of Mors
I ordered?

rows.label: qst501804_msg0003
rows.name:
No...actually, I was the Tome's
previous owner.

rows.label: qst501804_msg0004
rows.name:
Oh, really? What, you came to
bring it to me personally?

rows.label: qst501804_msg0005
rows.name: I'm so sorry...

rows.label: qst501804_msg0006
rows.name:
It seems...the Tome may have been
lost in transit from Superbia.

rows.label: qst501804_msg0007
rows.name: What?

rows.label: qst501804_msg0008
rows.name:
Well, not so much "lost" as...the
entire vessel carrying the delivery
may have been shipwrecked.

rows.label: qst501804_msg0009
rows.name: That's awful!

rows.label: qst501804_msg0010
rows.name:
Upon receiving your letter, I entrusted
the Tome to a courier so that it might
reach Avaritia as quickly as possible.

rows.label: qst501804_msg0011
rows.name:
But the courier ship got attacked by
monsters and sank, or something?

rows.label: qst501804_msg0012
rows.name: Precisely...

rows.label: qst501804_msg0013
rows.name:
You sounded so very enthusiastic in
your letter, so I felt I had to apologize
personally for this regrettable loss...

rows.label: qst501804_msg0014
rows.name:
Hey, it's not your fault!
It's the monsters or the courier
who are to blame.

rows.label: qst501804_msg0015
rows.name: You are more gracious than I deserve.

rows.label: qst501804_msg0016
rows.name:
But will this not present a terrible
obstacle to your research...?

rows.label: qst501804_msg0017
rows.name:
Don't worry! I happen to be acquainted
with a very accomplished salvager.

rows.label: qst501804_msg0018
rows.name:
Do you know whereabouts it was
the ship sank?

rows.label: qst501804_msg0019
rows.name:
I've heard it was around Umon's
Shipyard in Gula.

rows.label: qst501804_msg0020
rows.name:
All right, then. If we know the location,
that ought to be enough!

rows.label: qst501804_msg0021
rows.name: Thanks for letting us know, Teres!

rows.label: qst501804_msg0022
rows.name:
Oh, it's the least I could do.
I'm just glad I was able to make up
for your loss, if only a little.
